document_data.name: Holy Ones
document_data.mainbody: The '''Holy Ones''' were a group of religious scholars in the city of [[Yeshpek]], in the [[Land of the Lions]] region of [[south Faer√ªn]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: This group operated as part of the larger staff of [[Drestin]], When not working inside the palace, they administered Yeshpek's local shrines to the goddesses [[Umberlee]] and [[Waukeen]].
document_data.Members: The Holy Ones were entirely composed of rather haughty individuals who had, prior to Waukeen's disappearance, been high-ranking [[priest]]s in the [[Church of Waukeen]].
